channel.title: Server Idea. Just listen
channel.description:
Ok, we have seen 1000 different servers with the exact, unoriginal idea's. Leeched after leeched with nothing fun, nothing different.
We all know the best part of RSC was low-mid pking. What I am suggesting is to abolish the rest.
I know a lot of people like to skill, but they also like to pk. So here's what I think could work.
Have a combat skill cap. What does that mean? It means you make the absolute limit of combats at a mid lvl combat level, say 50 combat?
Have the server xp running at 1x the normal RSC rate.
Still keeping all skills, but as to keep it easy on pker's there will be a shop that sells food e.g. Mackeral, Trout, Pike and Salmon. All other fish e.g Lobs, Swordies etc. etc. would have to be fished to obtain them.
Deep wilderness would not need to be ventured into, there will be no "big, mean monsters" that drop "custom" items. It will be exactly like RSC as if higher levels did not exist at all.
The game would run a F2P format, running no members items at all.
That's my idea.
If you want to take it on board you can, or you can shrug it off and put up just another thoughtless lame server that will attract no players and be a failure like the rest of them. But hey, at least you had admin for a bit right?
That is all, comments, discussion...all welcome.
Flame welcome, it is Mopar.

item.title: Server Idea. Just listen
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“i_pk_pjers_i, post:18, topic:227885”][quote author=mkdj link=topic=299508.msg2405716#msg2405716 date=1219703612]

Ok, we have seen 1000 different servers with the exact, unoriginal idea’s. Leeched after leeched with nothing fun, nothing different.

We all know the best part of RSC was low-mid pking. What I am suggesting is to abolish the rest.

I know a lot of people like to skill, but they also like to pk. So here’s what I think could work.

Have a combat skill cap. What does that mean? It means you make the absolute limit of combats at a mid lvl combat level, say 50 combat?

Have the server xp running at 1x the normal RSC rate.

Still keeping all skills, but as to keep it easy on pker’s there will be a shop that sells food e.g. Mackeral, Trout, Pike and Salmon. All other fish e.g Lobs, Swordies etc. etc. would have to be fished to obtain them.

Deep wilderness would not need to be ventured into, there will be no “big, mean monsters” that drop “custom” items. It will be exactly like RSC as if higher levels did not exist at all.

The game would run a F2P format, running no members items at all.

That’s my idea.

If you want to take it on board you can, or you can shrug it off and put up just another thoughtless lame server that will attract no players and be a failure like the rest of them. But hey, at least you had admin for a bit right?

That is all, comments, discussion…all welcome.

Flame welcome, it is Mopar.

i agreed up until…
----------> The game would run a F2P format, running no members items at all.
because mine, and probably most other peoples on this forum favourite pking, was lvl 60-70 dds pures with like 70 - 82 mage.
[/quote]Wrong section, this is the rsc section…[/quote]

You just made me lol IRL.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Idea. Just listen
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

I don’t run servers, the only people i do are uptight pricks who don’t give a shit about anyone but themselves.

So I am presenting to you an idea for something new and different, so if you wanna give it a try. It could be a fun project I am sure, an untapped idea.

xEnt:

moparscapers talking beyond their capabilities, nothing unusual.

I think it is obvious that it is i don’t intend to release any private servers xEnt, as if you did not read it at all, I presented it as an idea. Not as a plan.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“F BaBy, post:13, topic:227885”][quote author=extacy link=topic=299508.msg2405375#msg2405375 date=1219693912]

If everyone loves low-mid lvl pking then they would get it regardless of the cap.
Kinda impossible on divine since theres no fatigue BUT swagpk ftw - xptoggle+xprate.

On-topic, don’t throw around ideas, get someone to implement them and be the first of your kind.

Hey um that was my idea and was the 1st to implement it, get your facts straight sweetheart.

Would you an e-cookie for it? Maybe a pat on the back?
[/quote]

Na i just love to prove assholes like you wrong!
Duh.[/quote]
